Class Player

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.model.Player
public class Player extends Object
Represents a player in the game, managing their personal information, game currency (credits), ship board, and game status.

  • Constructor Summary

    Player(String nickname, HousingColor color, GameMode mode, FlyBoard flyboard)
    Create a new instance of Player, it is called by the constructor of FlyBoard

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, HousingColor color, GameMode mode, FlyBoard flyboard)
      Create a new instance of Player, it is called by the constructor of FlyBoard
      Parameters:
      nickname - : String chosen by input from the player
      color - : HousingColor : the color assainged by the FlyBoard
      mode - GameMode the difficulty of the game the Player has been added
      flyboard - : the FlyBoard he is being added

  • Method Details

    • setRetired

      public void setRetired(boolean retired)
      Sets the retirement status of the player.
      Parameters:
      retired - A boolean indicating whether the player is retired (true) or not (false).

    • getRetired

      public boolean getRetired()
      Returns the retirement status of the player.
      Returns:
      true if the player is retired, false otherwise.

    • getNickname

      public String getNickname()
      Returns the nickname of the player.
      Returns:
      The player's nickname as a String.

    • getShipBoard

      public ShipBoard getShipBoard()
      Returns the ShipBoard associated with this player. The ShipBoard represents the player's spaceship and its components.
      Returns:
      The player's ShipBoard.

    • getCredits

      public Integer getCredits()
      Returns the current number of credits the player possesses.
      Returns:
      The player's credits as an Integer.

    • getColor

      public HousingColor getColor()
      Returns the HousingColor associated with this player. This color might represent their starting housing or team color.
      Returns:
      The player's HousingColor.

    • setHousingColor

      public void setHousingColor(HousingColor color)
      Sets the HousingColor for this player.
      Parameters:
      color - The HousingColor to set for the player.

    • addCredits

      public void addCredits(int quantity)
      add the amount of credits passed as parameter
      Parameters:
      quantity - : the amount to add

    • removeCredits

      public void removeCredits(int quantity)
      removes the amount of credits passed as parameter, setting 0 if not amout passed is greater the the available quantity
      Parameters:
      quantity - : amount of credits to remove

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object other)
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      other - : Object
      Returns:
      whether the object passed is the same Player, checking the usernames, returs false it the Object passes is not a Player instance

    • isRunning

      public boolean isRunning()
      Returns:
      whether the Player has been collected on the FlyBoard and he is playing

      public void setRunning(boolean running)
      \ Indicates whether the Player has been collected on the FlyBoard and he is playing
      Parameters:

    • setShipBoard

      public void setShipBoard(ShipBoard shipBoard)
      Set the ShipBoard of the player to the ShipBoard passed as parameter It is only used when copying an already built ShipBoard by default, and for this reason does not check anything on it
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - : the ShipBoard to set for the Player
